Necessary.Name: CookieConsent
Necessary.Purpose: Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain

Statistics.Name: _dc_gtm_UA-#
Statistics.Purpose: Used by Google Tag Manager to control the loading of a Google Analytics script tag.

Statistics.Name: _ga
Statistics.Purpose: Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.

Statistics.Name: _gid
Statistics.Purpose: Registers a unique ID that is used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the website.

Flag.Name: ads/ga-audiences
Flag.Purpose: Used by Google AdWords to re-engage visitors that are likely to convert to customers based on the visitor's online behaviour across websites.

Flag.Name: ads/user-lists/#
Flag.Purpose: Used by Google AdWords to re-engage visitors across the web in ad groups

Flag.Name: NID
Flag.Purpose: Registers a unique ID that identifies a returning user's device. The ID is used for targeted ads.
